name: DailySignal
text:
After months of downplaying the damage and danger of riots playing out in cities across America, the progressive mainstream just flipped their script.

Suddenly they are horrified by the violence—and they want you to know that it’s all Trump’s fault 🤦🏻‍♀️ https://t.co/OxkrYD51Jh

text: “I admired President Trump’s willingness to stand by his nominee despite the media and political frenzy and the handwringing of some weak-kneed members of his party in the Senate”  @marjoriesba looks back on what she learned at the Kavanaugh confirmation: https://t.co/SG4UTsNqYX
